thought: The workflow is correctly implemented to trigger manually and send the specified email.
plan: The manual trigger starts the workflow.
The Gmail send email action sends the email to the specified address with the given subject and content.
The mainWorkflow connects the trigger and the action properly.
criticism: No major weaknesses, but error handling can be improved in the future if needed.
